ygData.subject: Re: Sense Magic Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s the best way to practice your Diviniation skill, which is what Flash of Light (Rank 1), Sense the Dead (Rank 2), and Invisibility vs. Undead (Rank 3)
ygData.messageBody:
--- Tim West <twest@...> wrote:
> Has anyone found a use for this spell yet ?

It's the best way to practice your Diviniation skill,
which is what Flash of Light (Rank 1), Sense the Dead
(Rank 2), and Invisibility vs. Undead (Rank 3) all
use.

I use Sense Magic while fishing, five minutes or so
(with a Dwarven Paladin's INT of 60, mind you), and my
Divin has added the 5 more points I need since my last
level happened.

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-

believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
